curseofcurses.message: Something has cursed your %s with %s. You feel a sense of foreboding.
curseofcurses.configuration.curseTime.to: Time range during which curse application can occur.
curseofcurses.configuration.curseTimeAmo: The maximum number of curse attempts per night.
curseofcurses.configuration.denylistedCu: Curses in this list will not be applied. Supports wildcards (*).
curseofcurses.configuration.chance.toolt: Chance for an item to be cursed at midnight. Value between 0 and 1.
The number of curses to apply during curse time.
curseofcurses.configuration.cooldownSett: Determines which types of nights allow curse application.
Settings related to curses applied when skipping the night.
curseofcurses.configuration.title: Curse Of Curses
curseofcurses.configuration.enchantedIte: When enabled, cursed enchantments can also be applied to items without other enchantments.
